scripts.android_test: cucumber-js features/*.feature PLATFORM=android -r features/support -r features/android -r features/step_definitions --exclude features/ios
scripts.ios_test: cucumber-js features/*.feature PLATFORM=ios -r features/support -r features/ios -r features/step_definitions --exclude features/android
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
